name: MOONSHOT (itch) (BLANKDOG_studios)
description:
Made within the month of November for GameOff  2020.

You've been working hard getting things ready just for today, on your way to collect your last few essentials you bump into townsfolk who need your help! A small group of red-eyed crazies have been causing mischief and acting shady, it's up to you to figure out their plans and stop any nefarious deeds.

Exploration is heavily encouraged in this quirky little adventure, talk to townsfolk, gather info and have mini eureka moments when figuring out tasks! 

WASD to move.
LMB to attack.
X to select.
ESC to pause.

auto save feature so progress is maintained with the "continue" option!

Original main theme composed by Dj Noones @djnoones

"...telescopes? Didn't mention 'em!"
